fields.name: action-adventure
fields.description: Action-adventure is a mixed genre of computer games that combines elements of quest and action.

fields.name: sandbox
fields.description: A sandbox game is a video game with a gameplay element that allows players a high degree of creativity to interact, usually without any predetermined goal or, alternatively, a goal that the players set for themselves.

fields.name: superhero
fields.description: Superheroics is a genre of games where events unfold around heroes who are significantly superior to ordinary people and put their abilities in the service of some lofty idea: fighting crime, rescuing those in trouble, revenge, etc.
